site_title: deltachat.wiki - An unofficial guide to Delta Chat
hero_subtitle: Delta Chat transforms email into a modern, secure messenger. No phone number, no central servers, no bullshit.
feature_decentralized_desc: No central servers. Your messages stay on your device and move through the global email network.
feature_encryption_desc: Automatic encryption with OpenPGP. Only you and your chat partner can read the messages.
feature_universal_desc: Message anyone with an email address, even if they don't have Delta Chat installed.
feature_webxdc_desc: Powerful mini-apps and games that run directly inside your chat threads.
why_title: The Largest Messenger in the World
why_content: Delta Chat uses the massive infrastructure of email to provide a chat experience that is truly independent. It's the only messenger that works even if the other person doesn't use it.
footer_text: Delta Chat Guide - Made with ❤️ for Freedom

stories.title: What is Delta Chat?
stories.description: Delta Chat is a smart messenger that works over email infrastructure.

stories.title: No Phone Number
stories.description: To use Delta Chat, you don't need to share your phone number. Your privacy is our priority.

stories.title: Power of Email
stories.description: You can message anyone with an email, even if they don't have Delta Chat!

stories.title: Completely Free
stories.description: No central server, no ads, and no tracking. You own your messages.

footer_license: Licensed under GNU GPLv3 (Copyleft). Free to use and share.
external_link_desc: This link points outside this app. Webxdc cannot open external URLs. Please copy the address and open it manually in your browser.
